package:
ecl_converters_lite 0.50.1
These are a very simple version of some of the functions in ecl_converters suitable for firmware development. That is, there is no use of new, templates or exceptions.
Daniel Stonier BSD http://wiki.ros.org/ecl_converters_lite https://github.com/stonier/ecl_lite https://github.com/stonier/ecl_lite/issues Daniel Stonier -->
catkin ecl_license ecl_config
